languages.text: Пиратская флотилия нанесла удар по планете, когда орбитальные силы отбыли по секретному указанию Имперского флота. Ограниченный наземный гарнизон Астра Милитарум, ожидавший переброски, стал единственной линией защиты мира от зверствующих еретиков.

The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.
languages.original_text: Пиратская флотилия нанесла удар по планете, когда орбитальные силы отбыли по секретному указанию Имперского флота. Ограниченный наземный гарнизон Астра Милитарум, ожидавший переброски, стал единственной линией защиты мира от зверствующих еретиков.

traits.locale_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

languages.text: 帝国海军私下授意那颗行星的轨道部队离开，随后海盗舰队便发动了攻击。这颗行星唯一的防线，便是驻扎在地面的星界军。尽管数量极其有限，但只有他们能抵抗这群猖獗的异端分子。
languages.original_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

traits.locale_text: 帝国海军私下授意那颗行星的轨道部队离开，随后海盗舰队便发动了攻击。这颗行星唯一的防线，便是驻扎在地面的星界军。尽管数量极其有限，但只有他们能抵抗这群猖獗的异端分子。

languages.text: La flota pirata atacó después de que las fuerzas orbitales del planeta partieran por órdenes secretas de la Armada Imperial. El Astra Militarum, que esperaba el despliegue, era la única defensa del mundo contra los herejes descontrolados.
languages.original_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

traits.locale_text: La flota pirata atacó después de que las fuerzas orbitales del planeta partieran por órdenes secretas de la Armada Imperial. El Astra Militarum, que esperaba el despliegue, era la única defensa del mundo contra los herejes descontrolados.

languages.text: 海賊艦隊は、帝国海軍からの秘密の指令に従って惑星の軌道部隊が去った後攻撃した。展開待機中だった帝国防衛軍の限られた地上守備隊が暴徒化した異端者に対する世界で唯一の防衛線だった。
languages.original_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

traits.locale_text: 海賊艦隊は、帝国海軍からの秘密の指令に従って惑星の軌道部隊が去った後攻撃した。展開待機中だった帝国防衛軍の限られた地上守備隊が暴徒化した異端者に対する世界で唯一の防衛線だった。

languages.text: Die Piratenflotte schlug zu, nachdem die Orbitalstreitkräfte des Planeten auf eine geheime Anweisung der Imperialen Marine hin abgezogen waren. Die begrenzte Bodengarnison der Astra Militarum, die auf ihren Einsatz gewartet hatte, war die einzige Verteidigungslinie der Welt gegen die randalierenden Ketzer.
languages.original_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

traits.locale_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

languages.text: La flotte pirate a frappé juste après le départ des forces orbitales de la planète, conformément à une directive secrète de la Marine Impériale. Une garnison restreinte de l'Astra Militarum qui attendait son déploiement était la seule ligne de défense de la planète contre ces saccageurs hérétiques.
languages.original_text: The pirate fleet struck after the planet's orbital forces had departed on a secret directive from the Imperial Navy. The limited ground garrison of the Astra Militarum, which had been awaiting deployment, was the world's only line of defence against the rampaging heretics.

Une garnison restreinte de l'Astra Militarum qui attendait son déploiement était la seule ligne de défense de la planète contre ces saccageurs hérétiques.
